suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SQS queue driver and SES mail driver (~3.0).
suggest.doctrine/dbal: Required to rename columns and drop SQLite columns (~2.4).
suggest.fzaninotto/faker: Required to use the eloquent factory builder (~1.4).
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: Required to use the Mailgun and Mandrill mail drivers (~5.3|~6.0).
suggest.iron-io/iron_mq: Required to use the iron queue driver (~2.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to use the Flysystem S3 driver (~1.0).
suggest.league/flysystem-rackspace: Required to use the Flysystem Rackspace driver (~1.0).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the beanstalk queue driver (~3.0).
suggest.predis/predis: Required to use the redis cache and queue drivers (~1.0).
suggest.pusher/pusher-php-server: Required to use the Pusher broadcast driver (~2.0).
